title: The life of a Support Annie:
body:
Might Stun someone.

Oh hey, I can stun someone again.

Whoo teamfight I can stun the entire team.

And she occasionally Kills some noob and that's about it.

Wards.

Stuns people trying to gank her during warding.

And that's about it.

Wow OP worst Champion to a role ever - does nothing, is nothing.

Why does UOL Hylissang play this p.o.s.

Harasses you with auto attacks in lane and gets nerfed because it's uncounterable.

5$ Says Hylissang no longer mains this Champion now.

replies.body:
LMAO I actually laughed at this so hard.

But no seriously the reason that Annie is so good at as a support is because her engage is ridiculously good. With Righteous Glory+Stun+Tibbers it's a massive AOE stun that **almost impossible to dodge** <--- that's the reason she's so popular as a support. Ranged point and click stuns aren't abundant in League, but they are ridiculously good and reliable, which is why Annie is often played in the support position. You can flash Sej, Gragas, Braum, Leona ult. Have fun flashing Annie stuns.
zyra and lux duo is hilarious, they just keep you in one spot while zyra's plants get her kills
Have you ever versed a Leona + Braum lane? Made me want to kill myself, I would rather verse fifty Annie's.
